name: file_content_type
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pragmavantapi.
Tool description: Practical API for streamlined business and cloud applications.
API description: Determines the content type of a file from a given URL source using the Pragmavant API.

source.description: The URL of the file for which the content type needs to be determined.

cache_key.description: A cache key to use for caching the request. Defaults to 'c7b920f57e553df2bb68272f61570210'.
